tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE favorite_spots (
	spot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	spot_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	spot_category VARCHAR(50),
	spot_type VARCHAR(50) CHECK (spot_type IN ('Cafe', 'Co-working Space', 'Internet Speed Test')), 
	average_rating FLOAT,
	internet_speed_Mbps INT
);

CREATE TABLE work_cafes (
  cafe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  wifi_speed INT,
  power_outlets BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE co_working_spaces (
  space_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  amenities VARCHAR(255),
  membership_fee DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE favorite_cafes (
    cafe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    wifi_speed INT,
    coffee_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE coworking_spaces (
    space_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amenities TEXT,
    daily_rate DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE speed_test_results (
    test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    download_speed INT,
    upload_speed INT,
    ping_time INT
);

CREATE TABLE nomads (
    nomad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    favorite_cafe_id INT REFERENCES favorite_cafes(cafe_id),
    favorite_space_id INT REFERENCES coworking_spaces(space_id)
);

CREATE TABLE remote_work_cafes (
  cafe_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  cafe_name VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(200),
  wifi_speed_mbps INTEGER,
  rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE co_working_spaces (
  space_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  space_name VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(200),
  amenities VARCHAR(500),
  rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE internet_speed_test_results (
  test_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  cafe_id UUID REFERENCES remote_work_cafes(cafe_id),
  download_speed_mbps INTEGER,
  upload_speed_mbps INTEGER,
  test_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE digital_nomads (
  nomad_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  nomad_name VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(200),
  location VARCHAR(200),
  favorite_cafe_id UUID REFERENCES remote_work_cafes(cafe_id)
)

CREATE TABLE cafe_reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  cafe_id UUID REFERENCES remote_work_cafes(cafe_id),
  nomad_id UUID REFERENCES digital_nomads(nomad_id),
  review_text TEXT,
  rating FLOAT
)
